## ChangeDetectorPlugin.inputProcessors property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Input processors provided by this plugin. These transform various file formats into the normalized symbol map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly inputProcessors?: readonly InputProcessorDefinition[];
```
